local_intent: Move to a pre-place pose 10 cm above plate_center while ensuring the grape remains grasped, and verify arrival.
assumptions: Grape is currently held in the gripper
plate_center pose is known and reachable
coherence_with_global: Implements the transfer-phase step of moving above the plate (MoveAbove plate_center, offset_z=0.1) with a precondition that the grape is held and a postcondition verifying position. Uses Fallback to avoid unnecessary motion if already at target.
